title: Z-SAT: Zombie Survival Aptitude Test
description: Do you think you can survive a zombie outbreak? How will you know unless you take the test? The Zombie Survival Aptitude Test is one of the greatest tools a zombie survivalist can have. Find out what your grade is, before it's too late! Don't wait until the dead rise to prepare, do it now! This is the most important test you will ever take... it could save your life.
author: Casey B. Bassett
